text: Mohammad Maleki (; 11 July 1933 – 1 December 2020) was an Iranian academic and pro-democracy nationalist-religious activist. He was president of the University of Tehran for a short time in 1979. Maleki died of cancer and diabetes in Tehran on 1 December 2020 at the age of 87.محمد ملکی، اولین رئیس دانشگاه تهران پس از ۵۷، درگذشت ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Iranian academics Category:Iranian activists
title: Mohammad Maleki
